game.name: Last Heroes 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Find out what is ahead for Amelia and Roland, as they are headed to Odaro continent, in this new entry in the hit RPG series Last Heroes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Find out what is ahead for Amelia and Roland, as they are headed to Odaro continent, in this new entry in the hit RPG series Last Heroes!
